scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Shiny Smily Story' (English version).
MC section where Haachama thanks Kiryu Coco for appearing and talks to the audience.

subtitles.original: ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: Thank you!
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: というわけで、ココ会長と二人で、Shiny Smily Storyでしたー！
subtitles.english: So that was 'Shiny Smily Story' performed by Coco-kaichou and myself!

subtitles.original: あーとはあちゃま、ありがとう！
subtitles.english: And Haachama, thank you!

subtitles.original: 会長、来てくれてありがとう！
subtitles.english: Kaichou, thank you for coming!

subtitles.original: まったねー！
subtitles.english: See ya!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございましたー！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: はい、ということで、本当に最高だったー！ありがとう！
subtitles.english: All right, that was truly the best! Thank you!

subtitles.original: それじゃあ、残すところあと一曲。
subtitles.english: Well then, there's only one song left.

subtitles.original: やっぱりね、最後はこの曲で、締めたいと思います。
subtitles.english: As expected, I'd like to end with this song.

subtitles.original: それじゃあ、次の曲、いくよー！
subtitles.english: All right, let's go to the next song!

subtitles.original: みんな、ホントにありがとう！最後まで最後まで、楽しんでってね！
subtitles.english: Everyone, thank you so much! Please enjoy until the very, very end!

subtitles.original: 2021年も、よろしくー！
subtitles.english: Let's have a great 2021 together!

subtitles.original: One, two, three, four! Hi! How are you?
subtitles.english: One, two, three, four! Hi! How are you?
